title: Manchester United vs Liverpool - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Manchester United host Liverpool at Old Trafford in Sunday's only Premier League clash.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's men are without a win in three games and will be hoping they can stop Mo Salah and Co from getting their first win at Old Trafford in five home league meetings.

Jurgen Klopp's men will be facing Man United for the first time in a Premier League match whilst being top of the table as they look to make it a ninth consecutive win.

Sportsmail's Adam Shergold will provide live EPL coverage of Man United vs Liverpool including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's men  are without a win in three clashes and will be hoping they can stop Mo Salah and Co from getting their first win at Old Trafford in five  home league meetings.
